import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import AthleteService from "../services/athlete.service"; import { PaperClipIcon } from "@heroicons/react/solid"; import UserService from "../services/user.service"; export default function PreviewProfile(props) { const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: "", email: "", firstName: "", lastName: "", gender: { name: "" }, weight: null, height: null, birthDate: null, diseases: "", }); useEffect(() => { AthleteService.getUser(props.userId).then( (response) => { setUser(response); console.log(response); }, (error) => { const _content = (error.response && error.response.data) || error.message || error.toString(); setUser(_content); } ); }, []); return (

); }
